title: Einstein, Relativity and Absolute Simultaneity
description: Einstein, Relativity and Absolute Simultaneity is an anthology of original essays by an international team of leading philosophers and physicists who have come together to reassess the contemporary paradigm of the relativistic concept of time. author: William Lane Craig
